Text: Didn't work. Installation failed. Mac OSX Lion 10.7 in  VMWare Workstation 8
Can't possibly install it on Lion 10.7.2, it says unknown error, any suggestions!!!!

if you're getting the "unknown error" message, try rolling back the clock on your computer by a couple months.  If you check the installer logs it will show that the install fails because the license key for the package has expired.

look at the upload date and set your computer to that date
and i'll work
